summary.span: 表示文档级 Excel 项目中的一个工作表，这些项目通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建。

span.span: Represents a worksheet in document-level Excel projects created by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示图表工作表; 即, 只包含图表的工作表。A represents a chart sheet; that is, a worksheet that contains only a chart. 如果要在还包含其他项 (如单元或其他控件) 的工作表中创建嵌入图表, 请改为创建。If you want to create an embedded chart in a worksheet that also contains other items, such as cells or other controls, create a instead. 提供 Excel 对象模型中的本机对象的所有图表相关功能。 A provides all the chart-related features of a native object in the Excel object model. 但是, 也会公开事件。However, a also exposes events. 您只能在设计时在文档级项目中创建对象。You can create objects only in a document-level project at design time. [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void ApplyLayout (int Layout, object ChartType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ApplyLayout(int32 Layout, object ChartType) cil managed

param.name: Layout
param.span: 1 到 10 之间的一个整数，用于指定要应用于图表的布局的类型。

span.span: An integer from 1 through 10 that specifies the type of layout to apply to the chart.

summary.span: 将指定的布局应用于图表。

span.span: Applies the specified layout to the chart.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Layout`参数的值对应于功能区上 "**设计**" 选项卡上 "**图表布局**" 组中的可用选项。The values of the `Layout` parameter correspond to the available options on the **Chart Layouts** group on the **Design** tab on the Ribbon. 选择图表时, "**设计**" 选项卡可用。The **Design** tab is available when you select a chart. 每种图表类型都有自己的一组布局选项。Each type of chart has its own set of layout options. 例如, 饼图的布局选项不同于柱形图的布局选项。For example, the layout options for a pie chart are different from the layout options for a column chart. 如果要从不同的图表类型应用布局, 可以使用`ChartType`参数来指定`Layout`参数将引用的图表类型。If you want to apply a layout from a different chart type, you can use the `ChartType` parameter to specify the chart type that the `Layout` parameter will refer to. 例如, 如果您有一个柱形图, 并且想要从折线图应用布局, 请将值传递给该`ChartType`参数。For example, if you have a column chart and you want to apply a layout from a line chart, pass the value to the `ChartType` parameter. 布局仅添加可用于该特定图表类型的图表元素。The layout only adds chart elements that are available for that particular chart type. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息, 请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information about optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 下面的代码示例应用了第10个布局, 该布局可用于图表工作表`Chart1`中的图表类型。The following code example applies the tenth layout that is available for the chart type of the chart in chart sheet `Chart1`. 此外, 该示例使用方法来应用进一步的布局更改: 将图表标题的样式设置为居中, 并位于图表网格区域内, 为水平轴添加标题, 并为垂直轴添加旋转的标题。In addition, the example uses the method to apply further layout changes: setting the style of the chart title to be centered and to lie inside the chart grid area, adding a title for the horizontal axis, and adding a rotated title for the vertical axis. 若要运行此代码示例, 工作簿必须包含一个名为`Chart1`的聚集柱形二维图表工作表。To run this code example, your workbook must contain a clustered column two-dimensional chart sheet named `Chart1`. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWorkBook_Additional#18](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/trin_excelworkbook_additional/cs/ThisWorkbook.cs#18)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWorkBook_Additional#18](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/trin_excelworkbook_additional/vb/ThisWorkbook.vb#18)]

的值将确定`Arg1`和`Arg2`是否包含任何信息, 如下表所示。The value of `ElementID` after the method returns determines whether `Arg1` and `Arg2` contain any information, as shown in the following table. |`ElementID`|`Arg1`|`Arg2`| |-----------------|------------|------------| ||AxisIndexAxisIndex|AxisTypeAxisType| ||AxisIndexAxisIndex|AxisTypeAxisType| ||AxisIndexAxisIndex|AxisTypeAxisType| ||AxisIndexAxisIndex|AxisTypeAxisType| ||AxisIndexAxisIndex|AxisTypeAxisType| ||DropZoneTypeDropZoneType|NoneNone| ||DropZoneTypeDropZoneType|PivotFieldIndexPivotFieldIndex| ||GroupIndexGroupIndex|NoneNone| ||GroupIndexGroupIndex|NoneNone| ||GroupIndexGroupIndex|NoneNone| ||GroupIndexGroupIndex|NoneNone| ||GroupIndexGroupIndex|NoneNone| ||GroupIndexGroupIndex|NoneNone| ||NoneNone|NoneNone| ||NoneNone|NoneNone| ||NoneNone|NoneNone| ||NoneNone|NoneNone| ||NoneNone|NoneNone| ||NoneNone|NoneNone| ||NoneNone|NoneNone| ||NoneNone|NoneNone| ||NoneNone|NoneNone| ||NoneNone|NoneNone| ||SeriesIndexSeriesIndex|PointIndexPointIndex| ||SeriesIndexSeriesIndex|NoneNone| ||SeriesIndexSeriesIndex|NoneNone| ||SeriesIndexSeriesIndex|NoneNone| ||SeriesIndexSeriesIndex|PointIndexPointIndex| ||ShapeIndexShapeIndex|NoneNone| ||SeriesIndexSeriesIndex|TrendLineIndexTrendLineIndex| ||SeriesIndexSeriesIndex|NoneNone| ||SeriesIndexSeriesIndex|NoneNone| 下表描述了方法返回后`Arg1`和`Arg2`的含义。The following table describes the meaning of `Arg1` and `Arg2` after the method returns. |参数Argument|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| |AxisIndexAxisIndex|指定轴是 "主要" 还是 "辅助"。Specifies whether the axis is primary or secondary. 可以是下列 常数之一： 或 。Can be one of the following constants: or .| |AxisTypeAxisType|指定轴类型。Specifies the axis type. 可以为以下 常数之一：、 或 。Can be one of the following constants: , , or .| |DropZoneTypeDropZoneType|指定放置区类型: 列、数据、页或行字段。Specifies the drop zone type: column, data, page, or row field. 可以是下列常量之一: 、、 或。Can be one of the following constants: , , , or . 列和行字段常量分别指定序列和类别字段。The column and row field constants specify the series and category fields, respectively.| |GroupIndexGroupIndex|指定特定图表组在集合内的偏移量。Specifies the offset within the collection for a specific chart group.| |PivotFieldIndexPivotFieldIndex|在 T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotFields 集合中指定特定列 (序列)、数据、页或行 (类别) 字段的偏移量。Specifies the offset within the T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotFields collection for a specific column (series), data, page, or row (category) field. 如果放置区类型为, 则为-1。-1 if the drop zone type is .| |PointIndexPointIndex|为序列中的特定点指定集合内的偏移量。Specifies the offset within the collection for a specific point within a series. 值–1指示选择所有数据点。A value of – 1 indicates that all data points are selected.| |SeriesIndexSeriesIndex|指定特定序列的集合内的偏移量。Specifies the offset within the collection for a specific series.| |ShapeIndexShapeIndex|指定特定形状在集合内的偏移量。Specifies the offset within the collection for a specific shape.| |TrendlineIndexTrendlineIndex|为序列中的特定趋势指定集合内的偏移量。Specifies the offset within the collection for a specific trendline within a series.| ## Examples remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据值`Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType`指定的选项, 使用方法修改图表的元素。Use the method to modify an element of the chart according to the options specified by the `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType` values. 例如, 若要隐藏表图例, 请将值`Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType.msoElementLegendNone`传递给方法。For example, to hide the table legend, pass the value `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType.msoElementLegendNone` to the method. 在选择图表时, 可以使用此方法执行的操作对应于功能区的 "**布局**" 选项卡上的以下按钮:The operations you can perform by using this method correspond to the following buttons on the **Layout** tab of the Ribbon when a chart is selected: - **标签**组中的所有按钮。All buttons in the **Labels** group. - **轴**组中的所有按钮。All buttons in the **Axes** group. - **分析**组中的所有按钮。All buttons in the **Analysis** group. - **背景**组中的**绘图区**、**图表墙**和**图表基底**按钮。The **Plot Area**, **Chart Wall**, and **Chart Floor** buttons in the **Background** group. ## Examples 下面的代码示例应用了第10个布局, 该布局可用于图表工作表`Chart1`中的图表类型。The following code example applies the tenth layout that is available for the chart type of the chart in chart sheet `Chart1`. 此外, 该示例使用方法来应用进一步的布局更改: 将图表标题的样式设置为居中, 并位于图表网格区域内, 为水平轴添加标题, 并为垂直轴添加旋转的标题。In addition, the example uses the method to apply further layout changes: setting the style of the chart title to be centered and to lie inside the chart grid area, adding a title for the horizontal axis, and adding a rotated title for the vertical axis. 若要运行此代码示例, 工作簿必须包含一个名为`Chart1`的聚集柱形二维图表工作表。To run this code example, your workbook must contain a clustered column two-dimensional chart sheet named `Chart1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果忘记了密码, 则无法取消保护。If you forget the password, you cannot unprotect the . 最好将密码及其对应文档名的列表保存在安全的位置。It is a good idea to keep a list of your passwords and their corresponding document names in a safe place. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息, 请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来保护当前的所有内容。The following code example uses the method to protect all contents of the current . 然后, 该示例使用属性来验证图表工作表是否受到保护, 然后提示用户通过使用方法从图表工作表中移除保护。The example then uses the property to verify that the chart sheet is protected, and then prompts the user to remove protection from the chart sheet by using the method.
